content:
Google Drive is experiencing down time for some users this morning, Google has confirmed on its app status page that tracks service disruptions and outages for the company’s various web services.

Google noted in its first announcement related to the outage this morning that “Affected users can not edit folders they own within Google Drive.” Other users report not being able to access other files or features within Drive.

The company confirmed that it’s working on a fix for the issue and that it expects “a resolution for all users within the next 1 hours.”

We’ll keep you updated here as always when Google offers another update.
author: Jordan Kahn
title: Google Drive down for some users this morning, fix incoming
